item.title: Inspiration
item.description: I like many things. Here are some of them, so they won’t get lost. A collection of Explorable Explanations (explorableexplanations.com) Bret Victor’s projects build on human capabilities to extend thought (worrydream.com) Chris Granger also thinks programming is broken (www.chris-granger.com) Fiction to teach rationality (hpmor.com) Math should be legible (glench.com/LegibleMathematics) A collection of resources on simulating physics “for human visual consumption” (www.physicsbasedanimation.com) Soon, this list will be much longer.
